rows.label: qst702401_msg0001
rows.name:
Ahoy, Lieutenant Veronica!
How is the situation?

rows.label: qst702401_msg0002
rows.name:
Adel-sama?!
What are you doing here?!

rows.label: qst702401_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, after all that happened in
the capital...

rows.label: qst702401_msg0004
rows.name:
I wanted to make sure everything was
in order within the ranks of the militia.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0005
rows.name:
That's...very thoughtful, Lord.
In fact, we do have a small issue...

rows.label: qst702401_msg0006
rows.name: How small are we talking, though?

rows.label: qst702401_msg0007
rows.name:
Ever since Metsu's strike on the capital
earlier, the militia's been hemorrhaging
people at a steady clip.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0008
rows.name:
Just now, a soldier came to me saying
he wants to leave and go back to his
country...

rows.label: qst702401_msg0009
rows.name:
Made me want to grab him by the
shoulders and give him a good shake.
He knew what he signed up for!

rows.label: qst702401_msg0010
rows.name:
Easy now, Veronica. It should come as
no surprise... Witnessing Metsu's true
strength would have anyone quaking.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0011
rows.name:
It would take a stricter man than me to
try and keep them here against their
better judgment...

rows.label: qst702401_msg0012
rows.name:
But OK, let's talk numbers.
How many have we lost?

rows.label: qst702401_msg0013
rows.name:
Four frontline fighters, and two
camp guardsmen. Six in total.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0014
rows.name:
I'd like to secure more personnel as
soon as possible, but with things the
way they are, it doesn't seem too likely.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0015
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: qst702401_msg0016
rows.name:
Very well! In that case, we will canvass
the area for new candidates.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0017
rows.name:
N-no, my Lord, you mustn't trouble
yourself with such trifles!

rows.label: qst702401_msg0018
rows.name:
It's OK, Veronica.
I feel like I've been relying on you too
heavily in the matters of our militia.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0019
rows.name:
In times of trouble, I feel it's only fair
that I should show some leadership.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0020
rows.name:
I understand.
If you insist, Lord...

rows.label: qst702401_msg0021
rows.name: So, who are we looking for, then?

rows.label: qst702401_msg0022
rows.name:
Right, let's see... I think the most
important quality would be having
a bold and fearless spirit.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0023
rows.name:
Spirit?
You don't want skill, or intelligence?

rows.label: qst702401_msg0024
rows.name:
In times of peace, yes, those would be
desirable qualities for sure.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0025
rows.name:
But where we are now, we must stand
against the Holy Grail, an overwhelmingly
imposing foe.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0026
rows.name:
What we need is men with the courage
to face those odds, and not even flinch.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0027
rows.name:
Certainly...
That's the department where our
departees must have been lacking.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0028
rows.name:
On the other hand, we are, after all, an
army, so a sense of discipline will also
prove indispensable.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0029
rows.name:
No matter how brave, a single soldier
is nothing if they cannot cooperate and
follow orders to the letter.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0030
rows.name:
I see your meaning. Then we will
look for spirited and cooperative
human resources.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0031
rows.name:
That's right, my Lord.
There may be some left in the capital
who would wish to join our cause.

rows.label: qst702401_msg0032
rows.name:
Very well, then.
Leave it to us - it's as good as done!
